entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 07:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:56 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
